titleInfo.title: A laser-based coherent VUV source and its application to highly resolved studies of the Fano effect in HI

bibliographicCitation.chicago: Huth-Fehre, T., Mank, A., Drescher, Markus, Böwering, N., and Heinzmann, Ulrich. 1990. “A laser-based coherent VUV source and its application to highly resolved studies of the Fano effect in HI”. Physica Scripta 41 (4): 454-457.
